https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hJuDYdUnHtCBuQ9Ue8fen92Gf0e.jpg Bill Murray worries no one will show up to his TV show due to a massive snowstorm in New York City. Through luck and perseverance, guests arrive at Gotham’s Carlyle Hotel to help him — dancing and singing in holiday spirit. A Very Murray Christmas
